title: Chat Sound
body: it works when i log in and start chatting but after a few minutes it goes mute? i hear nothing when i get a message or send one, i can only see my league icon flashing orange on my taskbar.

replies.body: Huh, that's pretty weird. Let's try running a quick repair through the client options, as one of those files might be getting corrupted somehow.
seems to have fixed it, nice :D
